profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: All material in the collection comes from about 1870 and after.

origination.corpname: White Plains Public Library (White Plains, N.Y.)

accessrestrict.p: Available for in-house use by the public during library's open hours. For access, contact the library ahead of time.

bioghist.p: The local history collection of the White Plains Public Library.

scopecontent.p: The White Plains Collection includes books, photographs, maps, oral histories, pamphlets, clippings, and ephemera that help us understand the past in White Plains and build a richer context for our own time. Although our collection focuses on White Plains, we also hold material relevant to surrounding communities and Westchester County as a whole. The WPC includes newspaper clippings, magazine articles, photographs, brochures, pamphlets, published documents, and other relevant ephemera. The subject files are still being added to, but the collection is strongest from 1940-1990.

userestrict.p: In Copyright ­Non­-Commercial Use Permitted. Images can be used for non-commercial purposes without prior permission. For commercial use information, contact White Plains Public Library. For all uses, credit 'White Plains Collection, White Plains Public Library'.
